thread.title: Here are the road closures in UAE this weekend
thread.title_full: Here are the road closures in UAE this weekend

title: Here are the road closures in UAE this weekend
text: Here are the road closures in UAE this weekend Web Team Filed on February 23, 2017 | Last updated on February 23, 2017 at 09.08 am Share Vote Here are the affected areas plus your traffic update for the day. Specific roads in the UAE capital, Abu Dhabi will be closed to motorists during the weekend. According to Abu Dhabi Traffic on Twitter, the roads will be closed around the city for the Abu Dhabi Tour cycling race which on February 24 th , Friday. Below is a detailed map of the affected roads. Partial Closure of Abu Dhabi Roads - Length 153 KM on Friday, February 24, 2017 #RideToAbuDhabi pic.twitter.com/dDrkQcMZJG - STSC Abu Dhabi (@stscabudhabi) February 22, 2017 Weekenders and motorists are advised to follow Abu Dhabi Traffic for further changes in the road closures. In Dubai meanwhile, traffic in multiple areas were stalled due to road accidents. Some of the accidents took place in main thoroughfares such as E11 that runs from Dubai to Sharjah as well as in Sheikh Zayed Road. Another important road for the morning rush, Hessa Street also faced an accident which added to the already congested roads. Accident on D61 Hessa St before Al Khail Rd intersection towards #SZR / #Jumeirah causing congestion and delays. pic.twitter.com/gcnXRbINon
